definitions.definition: A mixture of water and soil or fine grained sediment .
A plaster -like mixture used to texture or smooth drywall .
( slang , construction ) Wet concrete as it is being mixed, delivered and poured.
( figuratively ) Willfully abusive , even slanderous remarks or claims , notably between political opponents.
examples: The campaign issues got lost in all the mud from both parties.

definitions.definition: ( slang ) Money , dough , especially when proceeding from dirty business.
( gay sex , slang ) Stool that is exposed as a result of anal sex .
( geology ) A particle less than 62.5 microns in diameter , following the Wentworth scale
( slang , derogatory , ethnic slur ) A black person.

main_definition: A mixture of water and soil or fine grained sediment .
secondary_definitions: A plaster -like mixture used to texture or smooth drywall .
( slang , construction ) Wet concrete as it is being mixed, delivered and poured.
( figuratively ) Willfully abusive , even slanderous remarks or claims , notably between political opponents.
( slang ) Money , dough , especially when proceeding from dirty business.
( gay sex , slang ) Stool that is exposed as a result of anal sex .
( geology ) A particle less than 62.5 microns in diameter , following the Wentworth scale
( slang , derogatory , ethnic slur ) A black person.

definitions.definition: A traditional Dutch unit of dry measure of variable size , frequently about 3 bushels .
A traditional Dutch unit of land area , vaguely reckoned as the amount of land required to sow a mud of seed .
A kind of box traditionally used in the Netherlands for measuring muds.

main_definition: ( historical ) A traditional Dutch unit of dry measure of variable size , frequently about 3 bushels .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A traditional Dutch unit of land area , vaguely reckoned as the amount of land required to sow a mud of seed .
( historical ) A kind of box traditionally used in the Netherlands for measuring muds.
